post_title: T206 Ty Cobb Portrait Set Available
post_content:
Good afternoon,

I am making my high eye appeal T206 Ty Cobb Portrait Set available for purchase. I would prefer to keep the foursome together, though will consider breaking up.

[URL="https://www.flickr.com/photos/196575621@N05/albums/72177720312411918/"]https://www.flickr.com/photos/196575621@N05/albums/72177720312411918/[/URL]

The set is ranked #32 on the PSA Set registry with only a half grade away from being a top #25 set.

$38,000 obo

Separately, will sell for:

Green Portrait Piedmont 150 PSA 2 $10,000
Red Portrait Sweet Cap 350-460/25 PSA 4.5 $12,500/Pending 
Bat on Shoulder Piedmont 350 PSA 3 $8,500
Bat off Shoulder Swet Cap 350-460/420OP PSA 4 SOLD

Only serious inquiries please.

Great collection!  Message sent
I will claim the red

Prices adjusted (Bat off and Red were swapped).
Red Portrait pending.
